documentation.value:
```prisma
relationMode = "foreignKeys" | "prisma"
```
___
Set the global relation mode for all relations. Values can be either "foreignKeys" (Default), or "prisma". [Learn more](https://pris.ly/d/relation-mode)

```prisma
schemas = ["foo", "bar", "baz"]
```
___
The list of database schemas. [Learn More](https://pris.ly/d/multi-schema-configuration)
